<NEW>

There was a grunt from DINOBOT.  "No."  he paused=
, then again went to consider.  "let the Autobots and Maximals deal wtih it=
."  THen another thought.  "Set off the explosives you hvae on top of the o=
nes that alreayd went off.  That will bury them extgra well and give us mor=
e time for our assignment."

In total fairness, setting off an explosion ev=
en when one had already gone off was totally acceptable tactical procedure.=
  They had the bombs, why not use them?
